subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Contador retained the overall Giro d’Italia lead a day after dislocating his shoulder in a crash, while Diego Ulissi won the seventh stage of the race, a 164-mile leg from Grosseto to Fiuggi.
snippet: Contador retained the overall Giro d’Italia lead a day after dislocating his shoulder in a crash, while Diego Ulissi won the seventh stage of the race, a 164-mile leg from Grosseto to Fiuggi.
